name: GE Blue Backlit Buttons Universal Remote Control, Samsung TV Remote Control Replacement, Samsung Remote Control for Smart TV, Roku Remote Replacement, Vizio, LG TV, Sony, 4-Device, Brushed Black 48843
short_description: Multi-device control – Operate up to four audio and video devices such as TVs, Blu-ray/DVD players, cable and satellite receivers, soundbars, streaming media players and more

Best remote code library – Universal remote works with all major brands and supports thousands of the latest audio and video devices (not for use with radio frequency devices like Roku Streaming Sticks and Amazon Fire TV/Sticks)
Preprogrammed for Samsung TVs – Universal remote’s TV button is preprogrammed for immediate use with Samsung TVs – simply add two AA batteries (not included)
Simple setup – Enjoy easy automatic code search and direct code entry programming, as well as master volume control to adjust the audio no matter which device is being used
Fully backlit with a stylish finish – The brushed black finish adds a classic look to any décor; blue LED backlighting helps you see each button in a dark or dimly lit room
product_description: Consolidate control with the GE-branded 4-Device, Backlit Universal Remote in a classic, brushed black finish. No more worries about keeping track of multiple controllers. This remote is designed to control up to four devices, including your TV, Blu-ray/DVD player, streaming media player, cable, satellite, soundbar and more. Eliminate the hassle of managing more than one remote and enjoy having full control at your fingertips. Preprogrammed for immediate use with Samsung TVs, this remote offers simple, user‑friendly setup with your choice of automatic code search or direct code entry programming. The master volume control feature allows you to adjust the audio regardless of which device is being used. Full backlighting with blue LEDs gives you enhanced visibility when operating your remote in low-light settings. For added convenience, this remote includes a Blu-ray/DVD player open/close button as well as advanced DVR functions, simple menu navigation and a dot button for direct sub-channel access. Organize your home entertainment with a GE-branded 4-Device, Backlit Universal Remote.

name: GE Rechargeable TV Remote Control, Universal Remote Control, Backlit Buttons, Samsung TV Remote Control Replacement for Smart TVs, Apple TV, Sony, Roku Replacement Remote, LG TV, 4-Device, 80984
short_description: Rechargeable – Save money by eliminating the need to replace worn-out batteries; 18 in. USB-C to USB-A charging cable included; remote stays powered for months on a single charge; indicator light glows blue during charging and green once fully charged

Multi-device control – Operate up to four different audio and video devices, such as TVs, Blu-ray/DVD players, soundbars, cable and satellite receivers and more; preprogrammed app hotkeys for direct access to Netflix, Disney+, Prime Video and YouTube

Best remote code library – Universal remote works with all major brands and supports thousands of the latest audio and video devices (not for use with radio frequency devices like Roku Streaming Sticks and Amazon Fire TV/Sticks)

Simple setup – Preprogrammed TV and STR buttons for Samsung TVs and Roku boxes; easy automatic code search and direct code entry programming for other brands and devices; master volume feature adjusts the audio no matter which device is being used

Backlit, slim and stylish – This universal remote control features a fully backlit keypad, slim profile and stylish crisp white finish with a black backplate to provide the perfect complement to your home entertainment setup
product_description: Take charge of your home theater equipment with the GE-branded 4-Device Rechargeable Universal Remote. This slim-profile remote’s integrated rechargeable battery keeps your remote powered for months on a single charge and eliminates the need to repeatedly replace worn-out batteries. Simply connect the remote control to a power source using the included 18in. USB-C to USB-A cable. The charging indicator light will glow blue during charging and green once fully charged. Designed to operate up to four devices, including your TV, Blu-ray/DVD player, streaming media player, soundbar and more, this universal remote control features preprogrammed app hotkeys for direct access to some of the most popular streaming apps: Netflix, Disney+, Prime Video and YouTube. The TV and STR device buttons come preprogrammed for Samsung TVs and Roku streaming boxes. Setup for use with thousands of other devices is easy with your choice of automatic code search or direct code entry programming. Additionally, the master volume control feature lets you adjust the audio regardless of which device is being used. For added convenience, this remote offers full backlighting as well as simple menu navigation and a dot button for direct sub-channel access. Relax and recharge with the GE-branded 4-Device Rechargeable Universal Remote.
